about_the_game:
FERAL SENSE is a 3D platform adventure that invites you to explore a desolate world filled with dangers from the perspective of a cat determined to escape an abandoned city ruled by machines. Answer the call of the wild and discover your primal roots using a special ability that connects you to your origins.



In FERAL SENSE, you must hide in the shadows and escape the ruins to reach the last sanctuary of nature. On this journey, you will find the strength of your species and learn to use your Feral Sense to survive. You must sneak, run, and overcome challenges to find the path to the sanctuary.

Key Features:



  • Explore an Abandoned World: Navigate through a semi-destroyed city, filled with mechanical dangers and hidden secrets. Every corner of this world is designed to challenge your skills and wits.
  • Dynamic Movement Mechanics: Run, jump, climb, and push boxes to overcome obstacles and find new routes. Fluid mobility and precise controls are essential for your survival.
  • Industrial and Futuristic Environments: From factories filled with gears and giant fans to desolate streets and mysterious ruins, each level offers a unique atmosphere and a set of mechanical and environmental challenges.





  • Special Ability: Feral Sense: After answering the call of the wild, the cat gains the Feral Sense, a sense that guides and connects it to its origins. Activate this ability to see the world in a completely new way.




  • Immersive Narrative: Discover the story of a world overtaken by machines and a cat's struggle to return to its roots in nature. Fragments of the story are revealed as you progress and explore the environment.



  • Smart Challenges and Puzzles: Solve perception and wit-based puzzles, use your special ability to find solutions that aren't obvious.


In FERAL SENSE, each level tests your ability to adapt and overcome obstacles in a world where life has been eradicated. With Feral Sense as your guide, find the path to freedom and reconnect with nature. Do you have what it takes to escape the city and find freedom in nature? Embark on this unique adventure and find out for yourself!

name: Feral Sense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 260X with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: FERAL SENSE is a 3D platform adventure. Play as a cat escaping a city ruled by machines. Use your Feral Sense to uncover hidden secrets and navigate dangers as you seek the last sanctuary of nature. Can you survive and find freedom?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
